How to get support

Please raise an issue on the project page to reach out to the developers.

Supported DBMSs and major versions

Obevo runs its integration tests against live DBMS environments. We aim to run as many tests as possible against a public cloud provider such that all developers can easily run tests and receive immediate feedback.

Some DBMS types and versions are not available in the public cloud, so those tests are run in locales where the software exists. The test feedback loop in that case will be manual - the code would have to be pulled within those environments for tests to run there. If a failure is noted, a core contributor will contact the developer who made the relevant change.

Our code is structured to make it easy for clients to set up their own test suites in-house, in case you have other environment types and versions that are not listed here. We will post more info on this soon - if you would like to leverage this now, please reach out to the development team

Vendor Test Locale
Sybase/SAP ASE non-public
DB2 non-public
H2 Local Project (in-memory DB)
HSQLDB Local Project (in-memory DB)
MS SQL Server (soon) public cloud
Oracle (soon) public cloud
PostgreSQL (soon) public cloud
Sybase/SAP IQ non-public
